doc.title: mreps

description.text: Algorithm for finding tandem repeats in DNA sequences

doc.reference: R. Kolpakov, G. Kucherov, Finding maximal repetitions in a word in linear time, 1999 Symposium on Foundations of Computer Science (FOCS), New-York (USA), pp. 596-604, IEEE Computer Society

R. Kolpakov, G. Kucherov, Finding Approximate Repetitions under Hamming Distance, 9-th European Symposium on Algorithms (ESA), Aarhus (Denmark), Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol. 2161, pp 170-181.

interface.label:
Specifies the resolution (-res)?
Integer value

Specifies starting position (-from)?
Integer value

Specifies end position (-to)?
Integer value

Processes by sliding windows of size 2*n overlaping by n (-win)?
Integer value

Report repetitions whose size is at least n (-minsize)?
Integer value

Report repetitions whose size is at most n (-maxsize)?
Integer value

Report repetitions whose period is at least n (-minperiod)?
Integer value

Report repetitions whose period is at most n (-maxperiod)?
Integer value

Report repetitions whose exponent is at least n (-exp)?
Float value greater tha 1.0
Output small repeats that can occur randomly (-allowsmall) Yes No
Do not output repetitions sequences (-noprint) Yes No
XML format output file name (-xmloutput)
